text: Billy Dee Williams (born April 6, 1937) is an American actor, artist, and writer. He is famous for playing Lando Calrissian in Star Wars and Harvey Dent / Two-Face in Batman (1989) and The Lego Batman Movie (2017). In a 2019 Esquire, Williams spoke about having a fluid sense of gender and uses masculine and feminine pronouns. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:African-American actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Billy Dee Williams
